(.촀\0Hope I don't fall asleep with

(촀\0It's almost time for the Bug-Off!
\0(촀\0 I'm
just pacing and twitching nervously

(9촀\0It's heren\0\0the big bug blowoutn\0\0
(촀\0The Bug-Off starts at 9:00 AM!\0\0(촀\0Are you ready, n\0?

(
촀\0Now, the way I approach a typical
Bug-Off is to try to get inside
the head of a bug.
(&촀\0What motivates the bug? 
\0What
drives the bug to BE a bug?
\0
(3촀\0And that is how I CATCH the bug.
(촀\0Hey!
\0 Are you writing this all down
or what?

("촀\0Heya! 
\0You bringing in the bugs
or what, n\0?

(
촀\0I still haven't found a bug with
just the right FEEL, you know?\0\0(촀\0Yes, I'm aware of how this contest
works, thank you very much!

(2촀\0Wow, what an event.
\0 I want to
thank the organizers, the fans,
really everyone involvedn\0\0
(5촀\0If anyone wants to interview me,
I've got copies of my rider available

(촀\0I'm not really used to chasing
anything, you know?
\0(촀\0 I'm used to

(&촀\0So, how'd you do in the Bug-Off?\0\0(\0촀\0Me? (
촀\0Well, I don't like to measure

(5촀\0I have my data team working on

()촀\0The Bug-Off is a delicate game of
cat and mouse, you seen\0\0\0\0(촀\0Today I was the cat, but you never
know what tomorrow will bring.

(촀\0Hey, I know I've got a lot of

we're in the middle of the Bug-Off!

(1촀\0You know that feeling, when you
catch the perfect bug?
\0 It's like,
\0
(*촀\0chills, you know!
(촀\0I also get the same feeling from

()촀\0Bug catching is all about positioning.
\0
You've gotta be at just the right
distance when you strike.
(5촀\0If you do it just right, the bug will
practically jump onto your net.\0\0(\0촀\0But get too close,
\0(촀\0 and he'll be on the
